article_title: Now might be the perfect time to consider selling your farmland
article_text:

00:17 Royals versus White Sox game postponed

01:57 Black faculty still scarce at University of Missouri

03:52 Royals Mike Moustakas talks about his torn right ACL

04:02 Mike Moustakas' torn ACL discussion with Sam Mellinger and Rustin Dodd

08:47 Deaths of firefighters a somber ordeal for KC fire Chief Paul Berardi

00:35 Andy Reid explains how Knile Davis has handled his demotion

01:14 Dickinson County tornado destroyed eight homes

article_metadata.title: Now might be the perfect time to consider selling your farmland | The Kansas City Star

og.description: Is now the right time to sell the farm? If you are a landowner nearing or just past retirement age, this might be the perfect time to consider selling. Cropland prices are at historically high levels, and particularly for top quality land, prices seem to have stabilized. Commodity prices are lower than in recent years and look to stay there for the immediate future. So with land prices high and farm income stagnant, yet with interest rates still at historic lows many landowners are wondering if this might be the right time to sell.
